channel.title: Chordify - App to help with chords
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I’m reasonably new an inexperienced when it comes to music theory. I’ve just stumbled across an app called Chordify which tells you what chords have been used in a particular song. It’s helping me with chord progressions and I just thought I’d share it with the community.
https://chordify.net

item.title: Chordify - App to help with chords

item.description:
Cool. I bs all my chords so this might actually help me

Read full topic

item.title: Chordify - App to help with chords
item.dc:creator: PISTOL
item.description:
Hi guys,

I’m reasonably new an inexperienced when it comes to music theory. I’ve just stumbled across an app called Chordify which tells you what chords have been used in a particular song. It’s helping me with chord progressions and I just thought I’d share it with the community.

chordify.net

Instant chords for any song - Chordify

Chordify turns any music or song (YouTube, Deezer, SoundCloud, MP3) into chords. Play along with guitar, ukulele, or piano with interactive chords and diagrams.

Read full topic
item.source: Chordify - App to help with chords
